adv: It is well organized and visualization is made automatically. The visuals were intuitive and understandable needing no explanation beyond what is presented in the legend.
disadv: It is quite slow, and the information present in the interface is more than what the user has asked for. It shows and loads related views before the user asks for it which can be a bit overwhelming for both the user's eyes and processor.
comment: Do not preload related views, wait until the user asks for it.
